attributes.title: it’s a no for me
attributes.review: this is the worst app ever!! it’s allows trump to be able to see you through your camera, didn’t think he could get any creepier!! when you open the app there is this awful video of mr cheeto twerking all sweaty and saying welcome, the scariest thing i’ve ever witnessed. i had to wash my eyeballs out with bleach and then had to go to the ER afterwards because of it. don’t do that to yourself and just don’t get the app!!

attributes.title: No💕
attributes.review: 🎶I was a girl in the village doing alright then I became a princess overnight now I’ve got to learn how to do it right so mich to learn and see up in the castle with my new family in a school that’s just for royalty a whole enchanted world is waiting for me I’m so excited to be Sofia the first I’m finding out what being royals all about Sofia the first making my way it’s an anventure everyday Sofia it’s gonna be my time Sofia to show them that I’m Sofia the firstttttt🎶

attributes.title: HECK NO!!!!
attributes.review: I got this app to support my fellow Cheeto man and when I opened the app it asked me for my  social Security number so I gave it to the app and next thing I know everything I’ve ever owned is gone. They took everything away from me. Then!!! I got a text from the Cheeto man himself and he asked how old I was I told him I was 14 the he said I could come over for a “good time” anyways this app mad me upset, homeless and violated would not recommend.

attributes.title: Awful!
attributes.review: I 100% do not recommend this app!! I came to this app to find helpful information about what is going on in the USA. Unfortunately, i was greeted by what looked like a naked cheeto... now hear me out, i was PETRIFIED!!! I open the app and see my president NAKED. I am MORTIFIED, and will NOT be going to this app ever again!! I see why this has so many bad reviews, i can’t believe i even bothered downloading it. I hope this app gets taken off the market!!!😡😡

attributes.title: AAAAAAAHHHHHH
attributes.review: So I download this app because I LovE trUmP and I wanted to support but when I downloaded it my phone exploded but it exploded on my whole family so I’m an orphan now so I only have my dogs but my dogs ate a Cheeto and died and this app killed my whole family do not support trump he will eat your family he is a cannibal. So if you love your family do not install the app because trump likes to eat peoples family’s and is a bad president teehee 🧡🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: do not get this app!! this app is absolutely trash when i downloaded it my phone glitched and it kept closing it also made all other apps slower and took up a lot of data the quality was terrible the format and layout of the app was to difficult also sometimes it won’t even let me open the app it was just so bad and the graphics of a fat cheeto pig were horrifying

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: Not only when I opened the app I immediately saw the worst image of my life. 🤮 My little sister was sitting next to me and she has nightmares now.. It- it- it was of a orange obese Cheeto. I do not understand why this sort of thing is on here. I am officially scarred for life. I do NOT recommend. Save your innocence. WARNING ⚠️ if you are stupid enough to download this app, make sure anyone under the age of 21 cannot see your phone screen.

attributes.title: Ewww
attributes.userName: get the cheetio out of office
attributes.review: This app is trash the cheetio man was all over it and he is mad that we didn’t go to is dumb rally so he thought take away tik tok well this ugly roche will not take my happiness this man is sad bc he won’t be president for much longer to he is taking everything away even his sons happiness he is taking away Roblox and Barron likes to play Roblox so what will he do take it away so get this ugly rat presidents app off of the App Store so we can have are tik tok
